column2: This shows that hotel has best restaurant and services.
The hotel has clean rooms and friendly staff.
The hotel is situated near to London city.
The hotel has variety of rooms such as small, double, two, one beds with different price range.
The hotel has all necessary facility such as pool, wifi, spa, parking, bar, etc.
The hotel rooms provides free facilities such as coffee-tea maker machine and good bathroom shower.
The hotel has good reception for bookings.
The hotel room has best hygienic bathroom and toilet with good facility.
The hotel is at proximate location for day to day life such as metro, train and also its close to city.
The hotel has variety of rooms in affordable price with good services.
The hotel surroundings are nosiy in both day and night time.
The hotel staffs are really helpful and friendly in nature with providing amazing services.
